âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Text-to-SQL generation â€¢ RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) framework â€¢ Support for multiple LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, HuggingFace, AWS Bedrock, Ollama, Qianwen, Qianfan, Zhipu)
ðŸ“– Summary: Vanna is an open-source Python RAG framework that enables users to generate SQL queries from natural language questions. It trains a RAG model on your data and then allows you to ask questions, returning SQL queries that can be automatically run on your database. Vanna supports various LLMs, vector stores, and databases, offering flexibility in implementation.
